document.title: Technical Bulletins: Public Chapter 509 slaps cuffs on utility revenues
document.abstract: This Technical Bulletin provides information about Public Chapter 509, which phased out the practice of transferring surplus revenues from utility sales to a city's general fund. The comprehensive law, which went into effect July 1, 1993, amended Tennessee Code Annotated (T.C.A.) ยง 9-21-308 and T.C.A. ยง 7-34-105, also known as the Revenue Bond Law.
